verbs.description: as [ARG2: polio - like illness] [V: strikes] [ARG1: dozens of children doctors] say the cdc is being too cautious dozens of young children have suffered from sudden paralysis this year in the latest outbreak of acute flaccid myelitis some experts say that the cdc cautious approach seems to be standing in the way of development treatment and prevention strategies especially as case counts mount centers for disease control and prevention d c cdc u s association football washington myelitis san francisco poliomyelitis polio los angeles times bove priya duggal johns hopkins bloomberg school of public health dr roberta debiasi dr roberta debiasi soccer
